combobox.name: RenumberMethod
combobox.label: Mesh options
combobox.help:
Options:

 1) Avoid nodes and elements renumeration, entities numbers are set increasingly when they are generated.
 2) Avoid nodes renumeration, nodes numbers are set increasingly when they are generated.
 3) Geometrical algorithm, ordered by the distance to some coordinate. It is the default value.
 4) Reverse Cuthill-McKee algorithm, similar to the previous one, but following element's connectivities.
 5) Ordered following the XYZ axes, interesting for special cases with geometry aligned to the axes.
